sheet_music.title: Sheet Music
sheet_music.description: Follow the musical notation displayed here. The playback bar moves across the notes you need to tap.

play_controls.title: Play Controls
play_controls.description: Start playback with the play button. Use 'Listen' mode to hear the exercise first, or 'Exercise' mode to practice tapping.

tap_button.title: Tap Button
tap_button.description: Tap this button in rhythm with the music. Try to match the timing of each note! You can also use the spacebar on desktop.

tap_visualizer.title: Timing Feedback
tap_visualizer.description: Your tap results appear here in real-time: 'Good', 'Too early', or 'Too late'. Aim for 'Good' every time!

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Adjust difficulty level, volume, and enable sound assistance to help you learn the rhythm.

results.title: Exercise Results
results.description: After completing an exercise, view your performance statistics and decide whether to restart or continue.

complete.title: Ready to Practice!
complete.description: You're all set! Start tapping and improve your rhythm skills. You can replay this tutorial anytime from the settings menu.
